description: Numbers n such that n^3 is palindromic in base 6.
comments: Note that '7777' is itself a palindrome, even a repdigit !Next term is >10000000000 - Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 09 2006
mathematica: For[i = 1, i < 1000000, i++, tmp = IntegerDigits[i^3, 6]; If[tmp == Reverse[tmp], Print[i]]]; - Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 09 2006
author: _Patrick De Geest_, May 15 1998
extensions: More terms from Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 09 2006
